channel.title: Pickup and Throw Combat?
channel.description: I think it would be interesting to see how you could include the pickup and throw into a combat situation. Imagine it, a Headcrab is coming towards you but you pick up a rock or other piece of debris and throw it at it! It would of course not be as powerful as a weapon and the strength of the throw wouldn't be as good as the Gravity Gun but it would enable combat situations similar to using the Gravity Gun. Plus it would be pretty realistic. (If I were to pick up a large rock and throw it a soldier, I'm pretty sure it will hurt him regardless of any armor that he has that's made to stop bullets) It would be an interesting way to use the new physics engine.

item.title: Pickup and Throw Combat?
item.dc:creator: rorriMAesU
item.description:
No Crysis mixed with my BM please.

Besides, you need the long jump module for further distance, so increased strength its not inherent in the suit.

Read full topic

item.title: Pickup and Throw Combat?
item.dc:creator: Saberfang321
item.description:
I guess the HEV suit does give you the strength to pick up enemies like it was nothing. It’d be cool to be able to corner an enemy against a railing, and just pick them up and throw them off XD.

Read full topic

item.title: Pickup and Throw Combat?
item.dc:creator: Brockley
item.description:
Simtexa:

How about the one in xen??? i heard that you where supose to avioid him, but i just jumped up on the mountin and started burning him with the gloun gun! I have no idea how to avioid him…(sorry for my bad english im not american):freeman:

wait…what? Are you talking about the gargantua? How does that…I don’t even?

Read full topic

item.title: Pickup and Throw Combat?
item.dc:creator: Dias
item.description:
Power_Dust:

Let’s assume the player throws every object with the same speed/momentum, the damage made with a monitor thrown would be indeed different from damage made with a can.

But damage from a large cardboard box would be less. My point is that the source engine already calculates physics damage & does so more accurately than we’re describing.

Read full topic

item.title: Pickup and Throw Combat?
item.dc:creator: Dr_Karamazov
item.description:
Simtexa:

How about the one in xen??? i heard that you where supose to avioid him, but i just jumped up on the mountin and started burning him with the gloun gun! I have no idea how to avioid him…(sorry for my bad english, im american):freeman:

fixed

Read full topic

item.title: Pickup and Throw Combat?
item.dc:creator: Power_Dust
item.description:
Dias:

Because that’s very, very lazy physics. Damage depends on force, which is a function of mass & speed.

And the word loose & lose are two different things.

Let’s assume the player throws every object with the same speed/momentum, the damage made with a monitor thrown would be indeed different from damage made with a can.

Read full topic

item.title: Pickup and Throw Combat?
item.dc:creator: Dias
item.description:
MacJARedd:

BTT: If you are including “pick-up-and-throw”-combat, how about the bigger the object, the bigger amount of hp’s your enemy npc’s loose?

Because that’s very, very lazy physics. Damage depends on force, which is a function of mass & speed.

And the word loose & lose are two different things.

Read full topic

We are silly developers.

added the ability to pickup and toss nades

item.title: Pickup and Throw Combat?
item.dc:creator: Dias
item.description:
Does the timer of the grenade reset when grabbed in HL2? (With use, not the gravity gun that is.)

Read full topic

item.title: Pickup and Throw Combat?
item.dc:creator: xalener
item.description:
JamesKane:

Fuse time is 2.5 seconds.
Picking up the grenade with the +use key will reset the timer to 2.5 seconds under two conditions.

  1. it was the first time the grenade was picked up
  2. the timer was less than 2.5 seconds

Sounds good, but if it’s like picking up regular props, how hard can you throw it?

Read full topic

item.title: Pickup and Throw Combat?
item.dc:creator: johnyo
item.description:
Lose the ‘almost’ and you’re probably correct. Dunno 'bout the rush though.

Read full topic

item.title: Pickup and Throw Combat?
item.dc:creator: bur
item.description:
seems a bit odd to reset the timer
you probably did it because it would be almost impossible to pick up a grenade without it blowing up in your face, but I think that would probably add to the rush

Read full topic
